casebody.data:
J. C. MILES and Willie L. Miles Individually and on Behalf of their Mother Mattie Parker Myles (Deceased)
v.
HOSPITAL SERVICE DISTRICT NO. 1 OF TANGIPAHOA PARISH, d/b/a North Oaks Health System NO. 2018-C-0703 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 14, 2018 Denied. JOHNSON, C.J., would grant.

HUGHES, J., recused.
